# curveEndCaps

**Instance Property**

An end-cap type for the curves in the geometry.

## Declaration

```swift
var curveEndCaps: MTLCurveEndCaps { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCurveEndCaps/none].
